named-native-query.name: CommitToFileAssociation.associateWithFilesFromParentCommit
named-native-query.query: insert into commit_file (commit_id, file_id, change_type) select :commitId as commit_id, f.id as file_id, 'UNCHANGED' as change_type from commit_file cf join commit c on c.id = cf.commit_id join file f on f.id = cf.file_id where /** select files that are present in the parent commit only **/ c.name = (select first_parent from commit where id = :commitId) and /** select only files that were not DELETED in the parent commit **/ cf.change_type in ('ADD', 'RENAME', 'COPY', 'MODIFY', 'UNCHANGED') and /** select only files that were not ADDED, COPIED, MODIFIED or DELETED in the current commit **/ f.filepath not in (select filepath from git_log_entry where commit_id = :commitId and change_type in ('ADD', 'COPY', 'MODIFY', 'DELETE')) and /** select only files that were not RENAMED in the current commit **/ f.filepath not in (select old_filepath from git_log_entry where commit_id = :commitId and change_type = 'RENAME')
